Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.player

Class ShortPlayer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.player.ShortPlayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public final class ShortPlayer extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents a shorted version of a Player that can be sent to the clients via network.
